channel.title: Rock paper scissors in a batch!
channel.description:
Bored as hell when I created, so here it is: [code] @echo off :gaygame title Gay Game! echo r is rock, p is paper, s is scissors set /p o=Rock, Paper, Scissors... echo. >> choice.txt echo. %o% >> choice.txt if %o%==r goto :rock if %o%==p goto :paper if %o%==s goto :scissors if %o%==g goto :gun pause :rock cls title Gay Game! echo Shoot! echo Haha, paper covers rock! goto :gaygame :paper cls title Gay Game! echo Shoot! echo Haha, scissors cut paper! goto :gaygame :scissors cls title Gay Game! echo Shoot! echo Haha, rocks crushes scissors! goto :gaygame :gun cls echo Shoot! echo Fuck, gun pwns all.... goto :gaygame [/code]
As you can see I added a cheat in there (lol).
Impossible to win unless you use the secret option.

item.title: Rock paper scissors in a batch!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

Bored as hell when I created, so here it is:

@echo off
:gaygame
title Gay Game!
echo r is rock, p is paper, s is scissors
set /p o=Rock, Paper, Scissors...
echo. >> choice.txt
echo. %o% >> choice.txt
if %o%==r goto :rock
if %o%==p goto :paper
if %o%==s goto :scissors
if %o%==g goto :gun
pause
:rock
cls
title Gay Game!
echo Shoot!
echo Haha, paper covers rock!
goto :gaygame
:paper
cls
title Gay Game!
echo Shoot!
echo Haha, scissors cut paper!
goto :gaygame
:scissors
cls
title Gay Game!
echo Shoot!
echo Haha, rocks crushes scissors!
goto :gaygame
:gun
cls
echo Shoot!
echo Fuck, gun pwns all....
goto :gaygame

As you can see I added a cheat in there (lol).

Impossible to win unless you use the secret option.

Read full topic
item.source: Rock paper scissors in a batch!
